title: Highly Efficient Ru-Decorated CeO2 for Photocatalytic Hydrogenation and Cyclization of Levulinic Acid to γ-Valerolactone
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01041H, Paper
Ganesh Sunil More, Rajaram Bal, Rajendra Srivastava
The photocatalytic biomass transformation to valuable chemicals and fuels is interesting but challenging. The Levulinic acid (LA) to γ-Valerolactone (GVL) transformation has been explored under conventional thermal conditions. Reports on...
